replies.body: Had some left over RP. Happened to be enough for a gift. Got Kitty Katarina. Legacy and totally worth it coz i dont really care for the other skins. Ty Rito

I have never purchased anything with rp since I started playing 6 months ago, I am very pleased with this ocean week event and so I thought it is time for me to contribute to the company. 

The daily buying limit is 20 I thought was 10 so I recharged $100 and was going  to buy 10 a day till the end of the event. But I am not going to recharge anymore since I only got what I list below:

* Surprise Party Amumu  - 1350RP
* Volcanic Wukong     - 975
* Definitely Not Blitzcrank   - 520rp - legacy
* Star Guardian Poppy   - 1350rp 
* Tundra Hunter Warwick  - 520rp
* Blade Mistress Morgana   - 750rp
* Bewitching Tristana     - 1350 rp
* Road Warrior Miss Fortune  - 520rp - legacy
* Mercenary Kataria  - 520 rp
* Emerald Taric  - 520rp - legacy
* Fnatic Janna   - 750rp - legacy
* Sweetheart Annie  - 750rp
* Freljord Ashe  - 520rp - legacy
* Buccaneer Tristana  - 520rp
* Secret Agent Miss Fortune   - 975rp - legacy
* Commando Garen  - 520rp 
* Baron Von Veigar  - 975rp - legacy
* Panda Annie  - 975rp
* Little Knight Amumu   - 750rp
* Sad Robot Amumu - 1350rp

Thats total of 16,460rp worth for 9800rp. well cannot really buy this with 9800 rp since so many are legacy.. 

thanks riot

BTW, i post this just in case others are wondering

ITS NOT A "HERES CHEAP LEGENDARIES!" it's double chance, you missed out

get over it
unfortunate man.

If, hypothetically, I wanted to do this, how would I? I can't find anything in the gifting centre that would allow me to do this. Is it because I'm not using the legacy client?
Check out the front page of the store, it should say Mystery Gifting with Double Legendary chance on the front page in the featured sections. If it's not there, relogin, and it should be!
is it want rp
Is the mystery skin icon in the skins menu? Because I am unable to find it, can anyone help a boy out?{{item:3632}} {{summoner:30}}
It's sitting to right of the main store banner on the 'Featured' page at the moment. If you still can't see it, try restarting the client!
Ah wonderful i found it, thanks mate
I'm still quite new to this but I just unlocked this self mystery gifting thing, what does it do exactly?
Random skin for 490 RP and a double chance to get a legendary skin, I just got Super Galaxy Rumble on my first try.
it means instead of gifting ur friend a skin for a champion thay have   u can gift ur self and more of a  chance to get sum-thing like black frost {{champion:34}} or a corporate mundo
pass
